description:
**Problem**
bd-3m5.17 is too large. Split: server handles inbound connections.

**Context**
- REALTIME_PLAN.md ยง9.1 (server.rs)
- Refines bd-3m5.17

**Design**
- Implement ReplicationServer in src/daemon/repl/server.rs
- TCP listener on configured address
- Accept loop spawns Session per connection
- Enforces MAX_CONCURRENT_CONNECTIONS (from roster or config)
- Unknown replica_id rejection if roster exists

**Acceptance**
- [ ] Server listens on configured address
- [ ] Spawns session per accepted connection
- [ ] Connection limit enforced
- [ ] Unknown replica rejected if roster present

**Files:** src/daemon/repl/server.rs
title: Phase 5: Replication server + accept loop

description:
**Problem**
Phase 1 implementation needs test infrastructure before tests can be written.

**Context**
- REALTIME_PLAN.md ยง18 (testing requirements)
- Blocks Phase 1 testing bead

**Design**
Create reusable test infrastructure:
- Test fixtures for StoreId, ReplicaId, NamespaceId (valid/invalid cases)
- Temp store directory setup/teardown helpers (creates $BD_DATA_DIR structure)
- Lock file test utilities (create, verify, force-release)
- StoreMeta test factories with deterministic UUIDs

**Acceptance**
- [ ] tests/fixtures/identity.rs with ID generators
- [ ] tests/fixtures/store_dir.rs with TempStoreDir helper
- [ ] tests/fixtures/mod.rs re-exports
- [ ] cargo test fixtures:: passes

**Files:** tests/fixtures/identity.rs (new), tests/fixtures/store_dir.rs (new), tests/fixtures/mod.rs (new)
